ygData.subject: Re: RE: [EverQuest] Sony sucks!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. My brother actually logged in the other day and was 55 still. I think they had a mistake with the credit card again like they did with his account
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. My brother actually logged in the other day and was 55 still. I think they had a mistake with the credit card again like they did with his account previously. I wanted to just do the renew thing again but I don't have that option as it says I don't have an account. So I'll have to wait til they open to renew. As it is, I already had renewed a few monthsa go for a 2 year subscription. But they keep doing a monthly thing and I think the credit card company is being retarded and refusing to pay bc they think we are being triple billed for one thing.
So frustrating.
Just 4 more hours til they open I think. I hope anyways..
Thanks Scott. *hugs*
luv,
-Su
ps. Btw, has anyone here played World of Warcraft?

======= At 2005-04-25, 12:21:00 you wrote: =======

>I'm glad you brought that up Su, I'm worried that your account was
>hacked or something because your cleric is showing up as level 34 ( I
>think ) and your brothers SK is showing up as level 19 ( I think ) and
>that really freaked me out. I understand that the guild aplet can
>sometimes be hosed, but that's never happened to me before.
>
>Please consider working it out with SOE, the rewards they are offering
>long timers like us for renewing for another year at $99 is actually
>really attractive and I bet you are 6 year vet too.
>
>Let me know if there is ANYTHING I can do to help you.
>
>Scott ( Paria, Nortic, Golden etc... )
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com] On
>Behalf Of Su
>Sent: Monday, April 25, 2005 8:54 AM
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EverQuest] Sony sucks!
>
>
>I may be through with EQ now. I went to login to check my email and
>apparently for no reason my account was shut off. I have no idea why.
>Well, I have an idea and it might be the same fuck up as with my
>brother's account previously. So, I have to decide whether or not I want
>to bother renewing because they will probably charge me a higher price.
>I had a 3 year subscription dammit. It just pisses me off that they
>pulled this with me. I'm thinking of writing them an angry letter of
>complaint. I should wait til I'm less angry though.
>ARG. Just ARG!!!
>luv,
>-Su
>
>
>
